name: Traceloop
headline: OpenTelemetry-based observability for your LLM application
description: Traceloop monitors the quality of your LLM application in production. It provides you with alerts, insights and gradual rollout capabilities to confidently deploy changes to your prompts and model configurations.

founders.name: Nir Gazit, Co-Founder & CEO
founders.description: Ex-Google, formerly chief architect at Fiverr. Over 15 years of experience building software. M.Sc in CS from the Hebrew University in Jerusalem.

founders.name: Gal Kleinman, Founder
founders.description: Formerly an R&D Group Manager @ Fiverr. Tech savvy with a vast experience leading software development projects from SaaS products and experiences to Data & ML infrastructure.

raw_markdown='[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/664553b7af7a800a7911b9f0/664553f95f4ec29495eb8eb9_traceloop%20logo%20dark%20bg.png)](https://www.traceloop.com/</>)

# The only way to monitor LLMs
Know when your LLM app is hallucinating or malfunctioning. Start deploying with confidence.
[Book a Demo![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/664553b7af7a800a7911b9f0/664553f85f4ec29495eb8e50_Arrow%20Black.png)](https://www.traceloop.com/<https:/meetings.hubspot.com/ngazit/traceloop-final-qualification-demo>)[Try for Free![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/664553b7af7a800a7911b9f0/664553f85f4ec29495eb8e50_Arrow%20Black.png)](https://www.traceloop.com/<https:/app.traceloop.com>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/664553b7af7a800a7911b9f0/665159985c7a7989caa71ce4_Workflow%20page%202%20\(1\).png)
Trusted by
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/664553b7af7a800a7911b9f0/668e4cbe47eac7eaee6e57a2_Simetrik%20Logo.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/664553b7af7a800a7911b9f0/668e4a8babe01af2c69a2576_Miro%20Logo.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/664553b7af7a800a7911b9f0/664556bfd9cfcc3afcc0a1c7_ibm%201.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/664553b7af7a800a7911b9f0/66799535fecf0dbdc488e4cb_Google.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/664553b7af7a800a7911b9f0/668e4b2a102a20967f7b54cf_Positional.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/664553b7af7a800a7911b9f0/66566de1473469cdf2e34065_cisco-logo-transparent.png)
## Why Traceloop?
Make sure your LLM output is consistent and reliable
[Backtest changes & monitor output quality](https://www.traceloop.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[Debug prompts & agents](https://www.traceloop.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/664553b7af7a800a7911b9f0/66455c26de911a238480b84f_image%2019.svg)
Backtest changes & monitor output quality
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/664553b7af7a800a7911b9f0/6645594cc680233e26eb5018_Checkmark.png)
Get real time alerts about unexpected output quality changes
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/664553b7af7a800a7911b9f0/6645594cc680233e26eb5018_Checkmark.png)
Learn how model and prompt changes affect output


![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/664553b7af7a800a7911b9f0/66514bc783708517f15b9e4b_Trace%20table%20copy.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/664553b7af7a800a7911b9f0/66455c26de911a238480b84f_image%2019.svg)
Debug prompts & agents
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/664553b7af7a800a7911b9f0/6645594cc680233e26eb5018_Checkmark.png)
Get suggestions on possible performance improvements
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/664553b7af7a800a7911b9f0/6645594cc680233e26eb5018_Checkmark.png)
Re-run failed chains and agents in staging
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/664553b7af7a800a7911b9f0/6645594cc680233e26eb5018_Checkmark.png)
Gradually rollout changes automatically


![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/664553b7af7a800a7911b9f0/669907944554805a2be0bf38_Trace%20table.png)
## The numbers
22
LLM Providers Supported
**155,424,054**
Traces Monitored
**1,365,530**
Hallucinations Detected
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/664553b7af7a800a7911b9f0/664553b8af7a800a7911bb79_gr_grid-3_4.svg)
## How it works
Seamlessly integrate Traceloop to monitor your LLMs
### Step 1 : Installation
1
Add this snippet to your code.
12
from traceloop.sdk import Traceloop Traceloop.init(app_name="my_app")
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/664553b7af7a800a7911b9f0/6645594cc680233e26eb5011_Copy%20Icon.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/664553b7af7a800a7911b9f0/6645594cc680233e26eb5018_Checkmark.png)
### Step 2 : Done!
2
You're done. Monitoring starts instantly.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/664553b7af7a800a7911b9f0/669907944554805a2be0bf38_Trace%20table.png)
What's in a membership
## bursting with powerful benefits.
### Unlimited-ish* requests
During your active subscription, you may make as many requests as you need. We’re available by Slack, Discord, or NYC pigeon.
### Fast turnarounds
We complete individual requests in an average of 3 business days (Monday - Thursday). Four-day work weeks are the future, baby.
### Webflow-powered
We build every site on Webflow, making them dynamic, accessible, and easily scalable. It’s easy for you like Squarespace but better.
### Multiplayer by design
We design in Figma and build on Webflow to allow you to make seamless updates at any time. Teamwork makes the dream work.
### One monthly cost
You’ll know your subscription cost upfront. No surprises. Except on your birthday.
### Flexible plans
Scale your plan up or down as your business needs change. No pressure.
### Made for you
We design and build custom for you. We’re never starting from a template unless you want that? You don't, right?
### Plug & play
We’re here when you need us and not on payroll when you don’t.
### Easy mode is on
You’re getting 10+ years of design experience with every request. No hand-holding required.
## Proudly open source with OpenLLMetry
At Traceloop, we believe in the power of community. Our tool is not just built by us, but also by other developers around the world who contribute to our open source project.Check out our GitHub repository to see contributions and perhaps make your own!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/664553b7af7a800a7911b9f0/664553b8af7a800a7911bb71_gr_purple-circles.svg)
## Zero integrationZero intrusion
Start your journey with Traceloop today
[Start now![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/664553b7af7a800a7911b9f0/664553f85f4ec29495eb8e50_Arrow%20Black.png)](https://www.traceloop.com/<https:/app.traceloop.com>)[Deploy on-prem ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/664553b7af7a800a7911b9f0/664553f85f4ec29495eb8e50_Arrow%20Black.png)](https://www.traceloop.com/<https:/meetings.hubspot.com/ngazit/traceloop-final-qualification-demo>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/664553b7af7a800a7911b9f0/664553f95f4ec29495eb8eb9_traceloop%20logo%20dark%20bg.png)](https://www.traceloop.com/</>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/664553b7af7a800a7911b9f0/664560419db06e3626b3e4e9_Github%20in%20circle.png)](https://www.traceloop.com/<https:/github.com/traceloop/openllmetry>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/664553b7af7a800a7911b9f0/664560419db06e3626b3e4f6_Slack%20in%20circle.png)](https://www.traceloop.com/<https:/www.traceloop.com/slack>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/664553b7af7a800a7911b9f0/664560409db06e3626b3e453_Linkedin%20in%20circle.png)](https://www.traceloop.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/company/traceloop/?originalSubdomain=il>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/664553b7af7a800a7911b9f0/664560429db06e3626b3e548_X%20in%20circle.png)](https://www.traceloop.com/<https:/twitter.com/traceloopdev>)

generated_description:
### Traceloop: Elevating LLM Application Observability

**Overview**
Founded in 2022 and hailing from the vibrant tech hub of Tel Aviv-Yafo, Israel, Traceloop is on a mission: to provide OpenTelemetry-based observability for Language Model (LLM) applications. As part of Y Combinator's Batch W23, this burgeoning startup comprises a dedicated team of six members, with Aaron Epstein serving as their Group Partner.

**What They Do**
Traceloop began with a simple yet powerful focus—monitoring the quality of LLM applications in real-time. Their platform equips developers with essential alerts, insights, and capabilities for gradual rollout to ensure that deploying changes to prompts and model configurations is done with confidence. 

Their tool is particularly effective at catching issues, such as when an LLM starts hallucinating or producing other unintended results. With capabilities to backtest changes, monitor output quality, and debug prompts, Traceloop stands as a guardian for developers looking to enhance their applications.

**Key Features**
1. **Real-Time Monitoring**: Get notifications about changes in output quality as they happen.
2. **Backtesting Capability**: Understand how modifications to prompts and models affect performance.
3. **Integration Simplicity**: Installation is straightforward—just add a code snippet to get started with monitoring immediately.
4. **Alerts and Debugging**: Users receive performance improvement suggestions along with tools to rerun failed processes seamlessly.

**User Engagement**
Traceloop isn't just about operational efficiency; it thrives on community. They leverage open-source principles through their OpenLLMetry initiative, inviting developers globally to participate in creating and improving the tool. 

### The Numbers
- **22 LLM Providers Supported**
- **155,424,054 Traces Monitored**
- **1,365,530 Hallucinations Detected**

**Why Choose Traceloop?**
With a tag of “developer-tools,” “generative-ai,” “saas,” and “open-source,” Traceloop positions itself as an essential companion for developers working within the LLM space. Their subscription models are flexible—scalable to match your business needs without hidden surprises. 

**Get Started**
For those eager to enhance their LLM applications, Traceloop offers features like:
- Unlimited request handling during your subscription.
- Fast turnaround times.
- A playful approach to customer support that's available via popular communication platforms.

At Traceloop, they are ready to help you ensure that your LLM outputs remain consistent and reliable, allowing you to focus on what truly matters—building great applications.

**Explore More**: [Visit Traceloop](https://www.traceloop.com) for demos, pricing, and to join their open-source community efforts.

In a world driven by ever-evolving AI technologies, Traceloop provides the clarity and oversight that every developer can benefit from.
